tasks.name: Gather Requirements
tasks.description: Collect input from stakeholders on desired features.

tasks.name: Design Wireframes
tasks.description: Create initial wireframes for the homepage and inner pages.

tasks.name: Build Homepage
tasks.description: Develop and integrate the homepage layout.

tasks.name: User Testing
tasks.description: Conduct testing sessions to gather user feedback.

tasks.name: Backend API Development
tasks.description: Build and test RESTful APIs for mobile app functionality.

tasks.name: UI/UX Design
tasks.description: Create app designs focusing on usability and aesthetics.

tasks.name: Integrate Payment Gateway
tasks.description: Integrate payment gateway and test transactions.

tasks.name: Beta Testing
tasks.description: Launch beta version for testing by a selected user group.

tasks.name: Market Research
tasks.description: Analyze competitor platforms and identify market needs.

tasks.name: Platform Architecture
tasks.description: Design the architecture for scalability and reliability.

tasks.name: Supplier Onboarding
tasks.description: Reach out to suppliers to onboard them to the platform.
